alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Shackelford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 5:53PM CDT until May 06 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Callahan County in west central Texas... Southwestern Shackelford County in west central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Baird, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Callahan and southwestern Shackelford Counties, including the following locations... Us-283 Near The Callahan-Shackelford County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 298 and 311. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
